content: It wouldn’t surprise me in the slightest if Trump believed that “Islam” is nothing more than a violent political ideology based on the perversion of a few passages out of a book. There is such a violent political ideology out there, and practiced by a couple hundred thousand people (if you add up all the people involved in Islamic-themed terrorist groups). This is not the same, however, as a major world religion practiced by about 1.7 BILLION people worldwide. If it can’t be confirmed instantly by his spokespeople that Trump recognizes this religion, it can be reasonably assumed he does not.
